title: Bible leads to glory
verses: My Bible leads to glory, My Bible leads to
glory, My Bible leads to glory, Ye followers of the Lamb.
Sing on, pray on, ye followers of Immanuel,
Religion makes me happy, Religion makes me happy,
Religion makes me happy, Ye followers of the Lamb, &c.
I'm on my way to glory, I'm on my way to glory,
I'm on my way to glory, Ye followers of the Lamb, &c.
I'm fighting for a kingdom, I'm fighting for a kingdom,
I'm fighting for a kingdom, Ye followers of the Lamb, &c.
King Jesus is my captain, King Jesus is my captain,
King Jesus is my captain, Ye followers of the Lamb, &c.
We'll have a shout in glory, We'll have a shout in glory,
We'll have a shout in glory, Ye followers of the Lamb, &c.
There we shall live forever, There we shall live forever,
There we shall live forever, Ye followers of the Lamb, &c.

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Celebrates the Bible's guidance to glory and the joy of following King Jesus
